command.name: list
command.description: List workflow sessions with status/progress metadata from .workflow storage.

intent.primary_user_value: See all workflow sessions (active/archived) with key metadata and quick progress counts.

must_not: no destructive operations (rm/mv) in this command
no unverifiable Existing pointers (use Planned + Verify when unsure)

p0: core sections present (Overview, Usage, Execution Process, Outputs/Artifacts, Error Handling)
evidence tables pass verify-evidence.js (dual-source docs + TS anchors)
